sn36.8:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn36.8:1.2: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena gilanasala tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
sn36.8:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn36.8:3.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn36.8:3.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.
sn36.8:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante patikkante sampajanakari hoti …pe… bhasite tunhibhave sampajanakari hoti.
sn36.8:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajano hoti.
sn36.8:4.4: Sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajano kalam agameyya.
sn36.8:5.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evam satassa sampajanassa appamattassa atapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati sukha vedana.
sn36.8:5.4: sa ca kho paticca, no appaticca.
sn36.8:5.7: Ayam kho pana phasso anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno.
sn36.8:5.8: Aniccam kho pana sankhatam paticcasamuppannam phassam paticca uppanna sukha vedana kuto nicca bhavissati’ti.
sn36.8:5.9: So phasse ca sukhaya ca vedanaya aniccanupassi viharati, vayanupassi viharati, viraganupassi viharati, nirodhanupassi viharati, patinissagganupassi viharati.
sn36.8:5.10: Tassa phasse ca sukhaya ca vedanaya aniccanupassino viharato, vayanupassino viharato, viraganupassino viharato, nirodhanupassino viharato, patinissagganupassino viharato yo phasse ca sukhaya ca vedanaya raganusayo, so pahiyati.
sn36.8:6.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evam satassa …pe…
sn36.8:6.6: sa ca kho paticca, no appaticca.
sn36.8:6.10: Kayassa bheda uddham jivitapariyadana idheva sabbavedayitani anabhinanditani sitibhavissanti’ti pajanati.
sn36.8:7.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, telanca paticca vattinca paticca telappadipo jhayeyya,
sn36.8:7.2: tasseva telassa ca vattiya ca pariyadana anaharo nibbayeyya;
sn36.8:7.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayamano ‘kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati. Jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayamano ‘jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
sn36.8:7.4: ‘Kayassa bheda uddham jivitapariyadana idheva sabbavedayitani anabhinanditani sitibhavissanti’ti pajanati”ti.
